contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Quiet Music 3 | Type = [[Album]] | Longtype = | Artist = [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] | Cover = Quiet_Music_3.jpg | Released = 1986 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Ambient music|Ambient]] | Length = 60:05 | Label = [[Fortuna Records]] | Producer = [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] | Last album = ''[[Quiet Music 2]]''<br/>(1986) | This album = '''''Quiet Music 3'''''<br/>(1986) | Next album = ''[[Western Spaces]]''<br/>(1987) }} '''''Quiet Music 3''''' is a [[Audio cassette|cassette]] album by the American [[Ambient music|ambient]] musician [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]]. It is the final edition of the ''Quiet Music'' cassette series. ==Reception== {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r128153|pure_url=yes}}</ref> | noprose = yes }} ==Track listing== #”Dreaming and Sleep” – 29:30 #”Sleep and Dreaming” – 30:35 ==References== {{Reflist}} ==See also== *[[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] *[[Ambient music]] *[[Electronic music]] {{Steve Roach}} [[Category:1986 albums]] [[Category:Steve Roach albums]]
